body.p: By default, a Schematron schema is validated as you type. To change this, , go to Editor Document Checking , and disable the Enable automatic validation option.

To validate your Schematron document manually, select the Validate action from the Validation toolbar drop-down list or the Document Validate XML menu. When validates a Schematron schema, it expands all the included modules so the entire schema hierarchy is validated. The validation problems are highlighted directly in the editor, making it easy to locate and fix any issues.
